suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.
suspicious.description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.

normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.
normal.description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.

delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.
delicious.description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
